title: Senior Specialist Automation Engineer
content:

Our NICErs bring their A game and spend each day turning it into an A+. And if youâ€™re like us, we can offer you the kind of challenge that will light a fire within you.Responsibilities
A subject matter expert for a technology or feature area.
Participate in feature design to define test plans within and across teams, with a focus on functional, business, complex scenarios, high impact projects, usability, and accessibility.
Define and execute test plans for end-to-end testing based on real customer use cases.
Automate all test cases and improve / develop test automation frameworks.
Building and executing test suites for distributed product deployment.
Monitor product and/or feature-level quality health metrics (test-ability, test health, test coverage, etc).
Troubleshoot production issues.
Installation and staging of product deployments in a variety of configurations to testing environments.
Influence and drive quality, product, and process beyond immediate scrum team.
Provide leadership and coaching to others on your scrum teams, as well as providing mentoring to others who may be on other scrum teams.
Build automation test suits for regression and new features. Testing UI components, Checking data in databases, automating deployment and data generation.
Open bugs detailing relevant information in a repeatable way.
Reproduce issues and verify defect resolutions.
Be involved in new features development, provide inputs to POs and Developers on the correct behavior of the system.
Install and Configure testing systems with latest deliveries for testing.
Interact closely with Build Engineers on the evolution of Continuous Integration and Deployment
Adhere to agile development principles while following and improving all aspects of the scrum process.
Skills and Experience required
B.Tech in Computer Science, Information Technology/Electronic Engineering
Total 11+ years of experience in testing distributed systems with web based front end and backend web services as QA engineer with very good test automation skills.
Must have experience in coding of the Automation Framework (TestNG, Selenium or any other UI/Backend Framework)
Hands on experience in programming language in any of Java.
Experience in using code versioning tools like - Git/Bitbucket/SVN.
Experience in preparing Test Plans/Test Strategies/Reports.
Hands on Test Management tools like XRay.
Database skills required with hands-on experience in SQL.
Experience with defect management and tracking tools, preferably Jira.
Experience with installing software builds/Configuration
Experienced working on Linux and/or Unix
Hand-on experience on AWS and Jenkins is added advantage.
Have excellent communication skills.
Be a self-motivated, rapid learner with an active interest in the latest tools, technologies and processes.
Experience working in Agile
Education Qualification:
ISTQB/ISEB qualifications.
Hands on coding experience in any software development or scripting language
Domain knowledge - Capital Markets / Trading / Fraud Detections / Compliance
Knowledge of Actimize AIS, RCM and UDM tools
